subsc: Agro-industry, marketing, and trade,General agriculture, fishing and forestry sector,General industry and trade sector,Agro-industry,Central government administration
trustfund:
TF020877-APEAC PROJECT,TF020809-AGRICULTURE PRIVAT. &
            ENTERPRISE ADJUSTMENT,TF029125-PHRD-ECONOMIC REFORM CREDIT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Agricultural Privatization and
            Enterprise Adjustment Credit supports the Government's
            efforts to establish an enabling environment for the
            agricultural sector by: 1) helping to develop land markets
            as the basis for sound agrarian reform; 2) demonopolizing
            and privatizing the large state-owned conglomerates that
            dominate agricultural marketing and processing; and 3)
            eliminating remaining price and trade distortions, as well
            as local governments' interference in commercial
            decisions.  The credit will be quick-disbursing and will
            provide balance of payments support linked to Board
            presentation and second tranche conditions.  The proceeds of
            the Credit will be used for financing of foreign exchange
            costs of general imports, except for a small list of
            ineligible goods.
